title: Good quality back packs .
text: I received my 6 new olive drab back packs today from fed-ex. Very impressed . I‚Äôve bought a lot of back packs over the last 20 years . Raising my 4 children myself . Lots of school back packs . These are for a hiking trip this time. The stitching seems strong and the fabric seems very durable and should last longer than most . I will be buying a rain proof back pack cover . Nice product. Yes I‚Äôd buy again . Plus I‚Äôm fussy when it comes to comfort and size of my pack . These actually fit great . They don‚Äôt hang down on your but . They are perfect height just above the belt line . Mt. Monadnock here we come . Plus going for a hike along the old railroad tracks from Massachusetts all the way up to Keene NH.

title: What?
text: I don‚Äôt know how this app has 4.8 stars or people complimenting UI. Maybe they paid for them? It shows multiple orders I‚Äôve made over the past 4 Months, but doesn‚Äôt show them as delivered/completed. Although in a different part of app it‚Äôs asking me to rate the items. So they‚Äôre showing as not delivered, but asking me to rate them. The most recent order I placed yesterday, on February 7th. Company shows as being based in same State as me so shouldn‚Äôt take too long? Only thing app showed me was estimated delivery date of September 1st for a few seconds then it went away and I can‚Äôt pull up estimated delivery date anywhere. Maybe some kind of a bug? Plenty of other companies have tracking numbers emailed, or at least send an email saying something like shipping label created, order not yet shipped. Any of those would better than this app which is not helpful at all. No purpose, except to waste time. At least for me.

title: More useful than expected
text:
I originally started using this because it was the only option to track an order for an ebike I bought last summer. That was presumably going to be the only time I would use this app, but then I started noticing it as an option all over the web. Now I‚Äôm super grateful to have all my order & shipping info all in one place.

I‚Äôm appending my review after reading some other reviews that demonstrate a lot of people don‚Äôt understand what this app is. This isn‚Äôt the store from which you‚Äôre buying nor the delivery service; this app just connects you with stores and delivery services & shows your orders and delivery information in a streamlined way.

title: Drivers need to KNOCK and/orRING DOORBELL
text:
I have several packages that were left BARELY on my open porch for all the public to see. One was there for over SIX HOURS because I DID NOT RECEIVE ANY NOTIFICATION that the very expensive package was delivered without ANY ALERT WHATSOEVER. 
Is it not the job of the delivery person to , as a courtesy and responsibility, to knock and notify the customer that package is on the premises ‚ÅâÔ∏è Is it not just being professional and considerate to do as little as ring the doorbell ‚ÅâÔ∏è 
I have THE RING and it didn‚Äôt detect the delivery because the driver barely came with in range of the RING security video. 
As stated above, this is the sixth, possibly the seventh time this has happened. 
In addition, drivers not wearing masks. 
PLEASE address these issues with your delivery people. Vast number of thinks are occurring and I feel blessed that I was not victimized by others who have no social moral compass. 
The drivers, however, have an absolute responsibility to do their jobs and follow DELIVERY INSTRUCTIONS THAT I PURPOSELY ADD IN DELIVERY COMMENTS. 
Thank you for your time and consideration. 
It is not lost on me that you are all under tremendous pressure and stress but being conscious of how you deliver orders will in the long run save money, time, energy and any hassles that customers may incur as a result of a driver putting 3 extra minutes of work in. 
Thank you for listening.

title: Slow updates on delivery
text: I like knowing when exactly my package moves from place to place down to the minute that it‚Äôs either accepted to a distribution center or going out for a delivery, but with this app it seems like all of that is slow to update because it won‚Äôt tell me about the whereabouts of my package is until much later after, for me I just go online if I want to know exactly where my order is and what moves it just took, I also put on text notifications from the carrier themselves so I know exactly when something happens. I still use this app though so I can see all my orders if I need to go back to them at anytime and a little bonus is seeing on the map the journey the package took which is cool, but either than that I don‚Äôt use it for its intended purpose because it‚Äôs on a delay and I need to know when exactly something new happens.

title: What A Joke!
text:
Downloaded this app & deleted it within a few minutes. It doesn‚Äôt automatically pick up the orders from your emails which are linked onto your phone. I wasn‚Äôt even expecting that but I was expecting this app to at least cooperate properly. I had to manually enter in my tracking number & the funny thing is, after I entered in one USPS tracking number, it didn‚Äôt allow me to enter a different USPS tracking number. It kept telling me that the new tracking number I tried to enter was already entered in & being tracked when it actually wasn‚Äôt. 

For any issues, it tells you to email the creator of the app but who got time to do all that shxt? I much rather just track my orders within my emails. What a useless a s s app. The developer of this app is rude as hell too. Look at how he responds to people when he receives a WELL DESERVED negative feedback for his crappy app. I dare you to respond back to me, I‚Äôll contact Apple & have them remove your worthless app from the App Store!

title: Shop cash is a scam
text: Useless feature. Keeps telling me I have five dollars to spend at any of the stores that automatically use shop pay. I try to use it on the stores website and it has no option for shop cash. It keeps making me 2 factor authenticate, never getting me to the option to use my 5 bucks. I try using the app to pick the item from the store, have to enter my credit card and address again?? Isn‚Äôt the whole point of the app that you already have this? Go to checkout. Payment options. Shop cash IS UNAVAILABLE AT THIS STORE. REALLY. YOU WERE THE ONE WHO TOLD ME TO USE IT HERE. it‚Äôs a mess and not worth it. Also, please don‚Äôt let everyone at my house know when I ordered something. And I don‚Äôt need to know when they have a package coming either. What is the point of connecting this to my email and phone number if not to personalize everything???

title: The best tracker
text: I absolutely love this app! I order whatever I order and I link my shop app and I can find out exactly where my package is and exactly when it will make it to my mailbox! And the shop app has ALWAYS been completely accurate about where and when it will arrive! I wouldn‚Äôt want to use anything else to keep track of my orders because this is the easiest and most accurate app I‚Äôve had for my deliveries and orders! Thank you shop app I appreciate all you do and keeping me posted on when my orders will arrive because I‚Äôm always so excited to get them and to be able to know exactly where it is and when it will be here makes it all the more exciting! Thank you!‚ô•Ô∏è

title: Worth it. Very helpful
text:
I was hesitant to download another app to add to my collection, especially an app that tracks. I could easily track it through whatever company it‚Äôs being sent by, right? Of course. 
I downloaded it anyways & I am so thankful I did. Not only does it show you where your package is, it‚Äôs literally shows you on a map. I can see how my 1 little package has traveled half way across the world before it arrives at my door. I can zoom in & out & follow the exact route their taking. Below the map it types out the route which includes the country, state, town & times. I personally love this app. I think it‚Äôs very helpful & it keeps me intrigued with what‚Äôs really going on around me. Win win.

title: MUST HAVE FOR ONLINE SHOPPERS
text: i love this app so much! i shop online pretty frequently and i have been for years, but this app makes it so much better! it alerts me every time there‚Äôs an update on a package and it keeps me from having to scroll/search through my emails to find the tracking number and all that stuff. i would 100% recommend at least trying this app out if you shop online. my only ‚Äúcomplaint‚Äù (if you can even call it one) is that it seems that not every website/online store is compatible with arrive, so it only tracks shipments from stores that are. but it‚Äôs not a big deal to me since it‚Äôs so great at what it does already! i just hope more stores start working with arrive because it‚Äôs so handy! GET THIS APP

title: Top notch delivery app
text:
I shop online almost exclusively and therefore need a concise and accurate app that follows my orders and alerts me when my packages are coming. This is especially important to me because I order from Sweden and other international websites. Since these orders are originating out of country, they tend to take longer which makes me worry if I don‚Äôt know no the status of where my package is at any point in time. Good job. Great app.

The only downside is if an item was returned to a vendor (for whatever reason), I can‚Äôt delete that old information.  It just keeps saying that the package is in route.  I don‚Äôt like this type of clutter filling up my online orders.  I have tried to delete this old info, but deleting is not an option.

title: Organization is Key
text: Ever have multiple packages coming in the mail and find it difficult to track them all?? It‚Äôs too tedious to repetitively check your email, or tracking number through a website, individually for every single one. With Arrive, you don‚Äôt have to lift a finger aside from entering in 3 simple things: the tracking number, delivery name of your choice, and the carrier (which usually pops up automatically once your tracking number is entered!). I have been using this app for a few months now and it is SO helpful. Accurate tracking of packages and the simplicity is amazing, simply open your app and boom - all of your packages are displayed with the estimate of their arrival. So happy with this app I recommend it to everyone!

title: Great project
text: KC body scrub is everything I recently discovered an exceptional body scrub that has completely transformed my skincare routine. This body scrub is a true game-changer, providing the perfect balance of exfoliation and nourishment for my skin. The fine granules gently buff away dead skin cells, leaving my skin feeling incredibly smooth and rejuvenated. What sets this body scrub apart is its incredible moisturizing properties. The blend of natural oils and botanical extracts not only hydrates my skin but also leaves it feeling soft and supple. The soothing scent of this body scrub adds an extra touch of relaxation to my self-care routine, making it a truly indulgent experience. I highly recommend this body scrub to anyone looking for a luxurious and effective way to pamper their skin.

title: Great but sometimes annoying
text: So far, I‚Äôve been using Arrive for about a month and I haven‚Äôt had any major problems with it. The few things that have been getting to me is duplicate items and a crash here and there, but hey, what can you do. I‚Äôve been enjoying it and it‚Äôs made life a lot easier. I‚Äôve been working a lot more 12 hour shifts than I would hope for so going through my email at work with bad signal gets really annoying really fast. Especially when it takes minutes to open a single email. With Arrive, all I do it open the app, and sometimes I gotta swipe down to refresh, then bam! All my orders are right there! I haven‚Äôt found another app that compares to Arrive, but I also haven‚Äôt been looking for another because it gets the job done and does it well.

title: I don‚Äôt usually write reviews but
text: I love this app! I love having all of my orders on one app instead of having to switch between different ones, I love how it automatically connects to your email and immediately uploads your order to the app, I love how up your date it is with your order. I‚Äôve  had delivered packages that have shown up as delivered minutes later to prevent porch pirates. To be fair I used to be very basics of this app, and it‚Äôs just to track my packages, but it‚Äôs all I need it for. It does an amazing job at it. You can even upload your own packages manually with a tracking number. I‚Äôd recommend this to anyone who receives packages often, it really helps you keep up to date.

title: Tracking package doesn‚Äôt work right common problem
text:
So I thought this app was cool because it was like layaway and you could track your package.

 However after using the app I quickly saw that when u have a package arriving the app shows 2-3 different packages shipping, even if you just have one. I‚Äôm not sure why it does this, but the other packages it shows you have arriving have different shipping numbers and different dates of arrival. Its not accurate and it makes it seem like you have bought more items then you really have. It made me nervous when I saw it because I thought that they charged me for something I didn‚Äôt buy. I found it‚Äôs better to just look directly from the ups website to track your shipment. This bug must be replaced the app is not sustainable if this isn‚Äôt fixed. The app has a lot of potential but maybe they just need another few years to work things out.

title: Recent changes making app less useful
text:
This app is slowly losing its usefulness. The orders page has been condensed to make room for showing products I don‚Äôt want to buy. When I tap on an order I am shown a pointless map and have to swipe to find the tracking number (to make room for products I don‚Äôt want to buy). Order updates are not being updated as quickly as they once were, which makes the previously mentioned change even more annoying.

Instead of improving in what it succeeded at (consolidating order information from several sources) it is instead being pushed into a direction that none of the users want: another shopping app. The stuff I want to see is always one extra tap away and the stuff I have no interest in is always there.

title: #7 Fiesta Mixing Bowl
text: +++++ First of all let me explain.  I was beginning to think #7 Yellow Fiesta mixing bowls ceased to exist.  For years regularly checking eBay and actually scratching up an online search.  Nothing.  You see I have all other colors in original bowls #‚Äôs 1-7 except I couldn‚Äôt find a yellow bowl.  Until now!  I am overjoyed.  And I found two more on your site after purchasing this one.  And this one was the best price and in just as good condition.  Why pay $250 to $350 more for a bowl when you don‚Äôt have two.  Don‚Äôt get me wrong; what I‚Äôm saying is it‚Äôs good I didn‚Äôt hit on the $550 bowl first because (and I may have hesitated a bit) I would have bought it.  And then seen this bowl.  Thank you.  I have waited a long time and am very pleased.

title: Blue Chip Thumb Pick
text: I‚Äôve been playing banjo for awhile now. I‚Äôve used a number of different brands of thumb picks. I don‚Äôt like regular metal thumb picks. They make a harsh metal sound and scrape the strings. Plastic picks gave me the sound I needed, but they would either break into 2 pieces or the tips would wear out in no time. I‚Äôd been hearing about the Blue Chip Thumb pick and different playing them. I got this in and found it to be what I‚Äôm looking for. It produces a great sound. The biggest plus for me is how durable it seems to be. If it seems to be pricey, it‚Äôs well worth because it durability. I spent in the last few months on different picks, I could of gotten one of these. It works out about the same. Well worth the money.

title: Although not as time sensitive as I‚Äôd like ..
text: Because I can assess from other apps either the ones shipping or the delivery apps like UPS, USPS, and FDX can directly send you the play by play quicker this app does allow me to actually remind me of certain things I may have missed on the other apps and have found it very useful in that aspect and for that it‚Äôs appreciated as it‚Äôs even helped me challenge the other apps on pkgs they stated were delivered and weren‚Äôt . So that in itself is a blessing and genuinely appreciated. Could it be more time sensitive of course however it does a pretty decent job of keeping you alert of all things coming even w the map display which is awesome as well.

title: Shop saved my package from being stolen
text: I expected a new phone by FedEx today but you know how it‚Äôs by the end of the day so after being outside waiting for awhile I went inside I wasn‚Äôt in the house 10 mins when I got a notification from Shop that the package had been delivered. I ran back outside and sure enuff there was a suspicious person walking toward my way, it was six minutes between drop off and Shop alerting me. It‚Äôs been more than an hour and I have not gotten notifications from either the retailer or shipper as requested that it has been delivered and the crazy thing is I neglected to use the Shop app during tracking of the package so thank you Shop!

title: Dont like the new update AT ALL
text: So it‚Äôs been a while since i updated to the recent version and I do not like it whatsoever. You used to be able to open the app and it would open directly to your packages. Now it opens up to ‚Äúshops you love‚Äù and ‚Äúnew arrivals‚Äù which i do not like at all. It‚Äôs inconvenient and doesn‚Äôt make sense if you just buy a gift from a shop and now you‚Äôre flooded with their items when you open the app. And then the biggest flaw of them all, when you click on your order updates, it doesnt show you which mail service a package is being delivered to unless if you click each and every one. Thats is EXTREMELY inconvenient because that was the sole purpose of the app. To track your packages. Now all it shows it a brown box as the icon. I will definitely be looking to find a better app now that this mess happened.

title: Latest Update Ruined a Decent App
text:
The latest app update added all kinds of clutter to the Home page, so only three packages show up. Now you have to tap ‚ÄòView all‚Äô to see all your packages. Every. Single. Time. You open the app. And, dark mode is no longer black but a weird dark gray/blue, so lighter than black. If this isn‚Äôt fixed, I‚Äôm ditching this app for good.

Prior to the latest update, I often noticed the tracking wasn‚Äôt updating in the app, but if I tapped on the tracking number to view the info on the courier‚Äôs site (UPS, USPS, DHL, etc.) the tracking info was available. And it wasn‚Äôt unusual for Shopify purchases to never update with the shipping info in this app, but it‚Äôs possible that has more to do with the way those business print their mailing labels. 

A number of improvements could be made:
1)  Revert back to the old Home page.
2) Revert back to actual dark mode (black)
3) Provide options for sorting tracked packages - by estimated delivery, date, status, and manual sort.
4) Add a search bar to the Archived page.

If at the very least #1 on the above list isn‚Äôt done, I‚Äôll permanently delete the app. The lack of usability isn‚Äôt worth having the tracking info automatically load for 50-60% of my Shopify purchases, and there‚Äôs no way I‚Äôd ever grant the app access to scan my Gmail account. That will never happen.

title: Dependable and convenient
text:
‚ÄòArrive‚Äô is an app I heavily depend on. Since I shop online a lot, I lose track of things I order. 
‚ÄòArrive‚Äô helps me keeps all my orders organized as it tracks it from my email accounts.
I also mail parcels across the world  quite frequently. It is convenient to help me track where the parcel is and provides a sense of security because I‚Äôm always worried that my package will get lost along the way. 
The only downside I would say is, sometimes it does not update as fast as just physically going on the app. Sometimes it will not update if your package has arrived as well. This is beneficial in cases that you‚Äôre not at home and they leave a parcel at your front door.

title: 1st Blessings Box ever ü§©
text:
I can not believe that this company was out here and I had No clue.  I ordered my fist box and waited in anticipation to receive it.  Well it arrived today and let me tell you ‚Ä¶. WOW üòÆ ‚ô•Ô∏è I am actually blown away the quality of everything is amazing. title: Drag up coffee
text:
Let me start by saying I absolutely love drag up coffee!!! Also let me say the people that own this company are so kind and helpful!!! They are willing to go above and beyond for there customers. I had a horrible time with getting my package to to be delivered by usps. Also let me say they have delivered to my house before!!! They sent my package all over gods creation and then sent it back to drag up!!! The owners of drag up were able to pull it off and get my package to me!! I would recommend anyone to this company I love there coffee and the fact that they actually care about there customers!!!

Thank you Drag up so much you always have a life long customer with me!!!!

title: Amazing! but have some questions
text:
This app is amazing! I am that type of person that gets anxious when my packages cannot be tracked or I only receive updates of my packages through email. This app shows me where my packages are, the stops it made, and when my package will arrive.

 Now my question is, I see that we can now shop through this app and that there are different prices in some products depending on the shop. For example if you go to the online Morphe shop a palette is $26 dollars but if you go to the Shop app the palette has a 50% off therefore $13. I don‚Äôt want to sound rude but why is that? And is it the real product that we will be getting?

title: Terrible app with fake reviews
text:
As a company, Shop is a useless middleman that takes a cut of every purchase in exchange for basically nothing‚Ä¶saving your shipping and email information? The autofill feature in web browsers has been doing this just fine for a decade. Package logistics for the company? None whatsoever. Shop doesn‚Äôt actually DO anything for anyone involved in the transaction. 

As an app, Shop is even more useless than the company that made it. Does it provide tracking information like a tracking number? No. Does it even tell you the shipping carrier? No. The date your package shipped? No. Expected arrive date? No. Does the shop app ask for all sorts of permissions to get into your email and track browsing activity as soon as you open it up? 100% yes. 

The reviews for this app are way too high. Look around at other app stores with Shop and you‚Äôll see the real reviews: all one star. All saying the same thing.  Shop must have paid for all these random 5 star reviews. 5 stars? Definitely not for crapware like this.

Shop does not offer anything helpful, new or different. Somehow they smooth-talked some small businesses into using them and now we all gotta suffer. 

Shop needs to just fail and fold as a company already because the world seriously does not need whatever they claim to provide.

title: The app knew info I didn‚Äôt give them.
text: So I downloaded the app because I have a heat sensitive package coming and they only offer tracking through this app. The email I use for packages is it‚Äôs own thing and I don‚Äôt have any other information linking myself to the email address. I put my email into the app to track this package and it says I need to verify my phone number and while I was reading that message, it sent a text to my phone and then auto verified. I didn‚Äôt put my phone number into the app, so how could it automatically know my phone number? At first I just figured it was connected to my email account and then I remembered which email I use, so that couldn‚Äôt be it. And then, when it logs in I see every online purchase that I‚Äôve ever made over the last couple years. If you can‚Äôt tell, I like my privacy. So deleted the account, app, and now I guess I‚Äôm going to sit and watch my mail box for the next week until it comes. ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

title: Doesn‚Äôt work as intended
text: I got this app so I could be notified when packages are delivered so I can grab them before they are stolen. BUT it never tells me when they‚Äôre delivered because it doesn‚Äôt update soon enough. The tracking number itself will show that it was delivered but the app will still say ‚Äúout for delivery.‚Äù So I find myself obsessively checking the tracking numbers anyway, which I don‚Äôt want to do. Then, I end up telling the app that a package had been delivered because I know before the app does. Why isn‚Äôt the app updating with the most recent status from the tracking number? If I waited until the app notified me about my deliveries, they would all have been stolen. It also has a problem with recognizing DHL tracking. The only reason I still have this app is because it has (most of) my tracking numbers in one place so I can click on them easier than searching through my emails. I‚Äôll probably delete it soon, though.

title: New layout is awful. I will not use this app for shopping.
text:
This app was great when the main page was just for tracking orders. I‚Äôm not going to buy anything through this app, I wish it would go back to the way it was. The home page being filled with ads is beyond annoying and makes the layout look very messy.

Edit: I‚Äôm updating my review because I‚Äôm very annoyed that you can‚Äôt rename orders anymore. The new layout is now even worse than the previous one. I have no intention of making purchases through this app, I wish there was at least a separate page with just a list of packages. Also, the estimated delivery dates are always wrong, they never match the date on the carrier site. I‚Äôve loved this app for years, but these last few updates and the push to get you to buy things through this app are such a turn off, I‚Äôm going to look for a new app to track my packages.

title: No communication!!!
text: I ordered items in April. Never received a shipping notice so I contacted the company via email a few weeks after to check the status. No communication back days later! I was patient because I know a lot of business were shut down for a few weeks due to the virus. So I tried to call again a few weeks later again and still no return call or communication of any kind. So I ultimately filed a complaint to dispute the charges with my credit card company after I couldn‚Äôt get any response and now today 3 months later I get a notice my items have shipped. I am patient and could have waited longer or understood if someone had just told me what was going on! Will never shop with you again if you can‚Äôt keep your customers more informed. I figured I had been taken by an internet scam when I couldn‚Äôt reach anyone by any means so my credit card company had refunded my items. Bad customer service and ZERO communication!

title: So convenient
text:
It pulls tracking info from the emails of my linked accounts and gathers the data into the app. SO convenient to have it all in one place! Now I don‚Äôt have to be bouncing from website to website checking on my orders!

Update: I‚Äôve been using the app for a few months now and I do still love it but here are some of my issues with it: the delivery day in the app does not always accurately reflect what the delivery website says; the packages don‚Äôt always say delivered when they‚Äôve been delivered; and the app does not always pull delivery information in from my email. The last one isn‚Äôt the worst thing because you can enter it manually, but it would be nice if the status was more reliably and accurately reflected in the app, as that is the entire point of the app.

title: Displays inaccurate shipping info
text:
I used the app when I first got it to track several different packages from several different carriers at the same time. Just because I was curious I decided to also track the same packages on the carriers apps and websites to see if Arrive was accurate, it wasn‚Äôt. 
It never displayed the proper info about were both my UPS packages were, but the UPS app gave me a much better idea where they were and have gave an accurate delivery time window which Arrive didn‚Äôt. 
The worst was my fedex package. I ordered my item expecting a delivery on Thursday at the latest while from he minute it shipped, Arrive was telling me to expect my package on Friday. In comparison, the fedex website said I would still be getting it on the Thursday which I did. It‚Äôs a good idea for an app but if it can‚Äôt tell me the correct day my package should arrive, let alone a time window, then it‚Äôs not worth having.

title: GIFT FROM SHOPPER GODS
text: Shop is AMAZING. It tracks all of my packages from the minute I place an order online. Right after I click ‚Äúpurchase‚Äù I get that lovely ding from shop notifying me that my order has been placed. Occasionally some purchases do not end up on Shop automatically, I‚Äôm not sure why, but when this happens, I just create the tracking for the new purchase manually and then it works just like the automatic ones. The best part about this app is that it‚Äôs FREE and it really helps. Although, dare I say it, Shop is so much fun that I find myself making unnecessary purchases bc I love seeing all my orders pile up on Shop‚ÄîI love scrolling through my tracked purchases all in one location. Great app!

title: Order 144
text: I often use Shop bc I like being able to track my orders. I‚Äôm the type of shopper who gets anxious and is like super eager to see packages at my doorstep. Shop app allows me to monitor where my package is at all times. Plus Saltair products are delivered so much quicker on Shoo than the website. 10/10 recommend. In addition to the tracking feature, Shop offers different vending stores to browse and the quality of the clothes is amazing. From brands like Nike and Champion, to niche items like DragRace merch and Big and Tall stores ( I am 6‚Äô2, 290) there are always options for me to shop. I will always use this app as long as it‚Äôs available and I should too!!!

title: Zero stars!!  This is a scam - do not order.
text:
I ordered the Garden stand and seat and it was supposed to arrive in 7-10 days.  After a few days I got a message that it was on its way to the post office along with a tracking number.  But after three weeks it had not arrived and there was no update on the shipment through the tracking number.  I attempted to contact the seller twice, but they did not respond.  Then I got a message that it had arrived at a post office (apparently from China).  

A package arrived a month after I had ordered it, but it was the size of a large envelope and contained a green piece of material shaped like a pocket attachment.  I searched Facebook and saw dozens of comments from other buyers said the same thing had happened to them.  I have attempted to contact the seller five times and have never received any response. I have notified my credit card and initiated a claim with PayPal.  Do not fall prey to this scam product!  You will be sorry if you do!!!

title: Terrible Since It Became ‚ÄúShop‚Äù
text: I echo a lot of the same sentiments about this app being sloppy, badly re-designed, and extremely underwhelming since it was hijacked from Aftership to Shop. For example, I had a delivery scheduled to a vendor today that was delivered four hours ago and I‚Äôm finally receiving a delivery notification now. The app actually still shows the shipment as ‚ÄúOut for Delivery.‚Äù A lot of times, my shipments can be as much as a day off and out of sync with the app. Also, as much as I‚Äôm for helping the environment with common sense solutions, the Shop app came on really strong trying to sell the concepts of carbon of-setting while bloating a once great/simple shipment tracking app with a shopping app and overly aggressive info about their supposed concern for the environment. I‚Äôm not buying it... and yes, you do get what you pay for since this app is free. I‚Äôd pay just for the app to be simplified again and do what it used to do with Aftership. A deserving one star.

title: Fedex
text: I don‚Äôt like to get deliveries from fedx because the drivers are lazy. Today‚Äôs driver walked to the bottom of the first level to our deck and literally threw the box up the stairs. I had to walk down the top level and down the walk to get the package. I‚Äôve also had drivers leave packages at the end of the long driveway almost in the street. Other delivery drivers from other companies will pull into our driveway and leave on the front porch. Easier for both of us. I‚Äôm in my 70‚Äôs and have health problems due to giving my husband 24/7 care before his passing. I this service is a necessity for me and I really appreciate it but the drivers need to do their job! Thank you

title: YOU NEED THIS
text: Being a very anxtyüò© person, I absolutely HATE üò°waiting for packages, not knowing where they are, and so on. This app has literally SAVED MY LIFEüòá. It is so extremely simple but it does everything I need and more. All you need is the tracking number #Ô∏è‚É£and what it‚Äôs being shipped by. Then it gives you a map of where it is, all the info on when it‚Äôs been processed, and what step of shipment it is in. Most apps that I like have a catch; for example, too many adsü§¶‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è. I‚Äôm literally BLOWN ü§ØAWAY by the fact that there just ISN‚ÄôT ONE. I always try to search for apps but they don‚Äôt ever reach my expectations. For once something has absolutely exceeded them. You absolutely NEED THIS PEOPLE.

title: Extremely useful
text: Love this app because it saves me from keeping several open tabs with tracking numbers I have to copy and paste from email, it often lets me know something is on the way before I have a chance to see the email. My only complaint is with some packages I‚Äôve noticed that it updates behind the USPS site if I have the tracking pulled up I can sometimes see updates that are not yet visible on the app, even after I refresh it and I feel is should be able to display those immediately as it is just scraping the public site for whatever carrier. Still five stars because it‚Äôs great to be able to name each package and have a history of my past deliveries for reference.

title: App Changes Required
text: So this app is the best app I‚Äôve come across for checking up on products delivery time etc... But there‚Äôs just one thing I don‚Äôt like, it always says it will get here ‚ÄúTomorrow‚Äù on the day it gets here. That should be changed to ‚Äútoday‚Äù. I‚Äôve had porch pirates come steal my products before, and I expected my package to be here a day late because the app said ‚Äútomorrow‚Äù. And I went out to buy Christmas presents and then all of a sudden I get a message from my neighbors and it says ‚ÄúHey I got your package just come by when you have a chance‚Äù. I was shocked because this was my first time using the app and I would expect a specific date to arrival. I‚Äôm just lucky nobody stole my iPhone 11 when it got here, but the arrival time should be more accurate on the specific date.

title: Plus size woman- First time ordering!
text:
I have been witnessing many plus size ladies and some not plus size gals showing off their SHEIN finds and thought I need to try them out! Well I was recently in Las Vegas and ran into a well dressed plus size gal, she told me her outfit yup..came from SHEIN! So I finally decided to give them a shot, and I am happy to report I was floored with excitement! I ordered 4 dresses 1 top and 1 skirt, everything except the skirt fit meüò≥.  I am a 3x big hip, big thigh kind of girl, most clothes are a hard to fit me in the hip area, almost always too tight! 
This was a great first experience and I can‚Äôt wait to order more cute things. The quality was way better than I expected too.

title: Mostly amazing
text: I didn‚Äôt know this app existed and now that I have used it for so long idk how I ever went with out it! We love small shop clothing and shoes, like I may have s problem! This app has been great to be able to keep track of all the packages I forget I ordered ü§¶üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è there is a slight issue though, I used to be able to click see order email and know what I ordered and where from because as I said, I forget often. However, when I click on it now it‚Äôs always blank, which as someone who orders a lot of stuff is a little frustrating. A lot of the times a picture is posted so that‚Äôs helpful, but not on all orders so it was nice to be able to go back to the email to see what I bought. I hope this is fixed soon. Other than that this app is amazing!

title: Shopping with Afterpay & Shop
text: I was blessed with nice skin and at 67 I don‚Äôt look a day over 50, all because I have taken good care of my skin by using great skincare products & always wearing an SPF of 30 or higher. I have a large skincare Arsenal because your skin needs variety or it becomes apathetic to even the most expensive products !  Your skin benefits from rotating quality formularies because a diet of the same ingredients loses efficacy otherwise. One of the ways I have been able to do this is through SHOP & Afterpay - I‚Äôve been a client for several years now, and it‚Äôs convenient & affordable, plus they offer a quick, secure checkout and updates on tracking delivery !

title: Drone delivery in pouring down rain
text:
My Exo Drone was scheduled to be delivered today and the weather was for sure the worst day of the entire year so far. Not just showers       
Thru out the day.. pouring down rain causing flooding every where in the Washington DC Region.  And the drone company emphasized someone needed to be home to bring the box inside so that the electronics weren‚Äôt damaged or the $300 worth of battery‚Äôs in the box. The SHOP app didn‚Äôt give live up to date location of the package , infact the last update I received was 14 hours prior to my package arriving with a message that said your package will be delivered ‚ÄúToday‚Äù before 7pm. So I now have a 14 hour window to expect my package .. not much help guys. But not sure if that‚Äôs the shippers (UPS) or SHOPS lack of updates??

title: Awesome package tracking!
text:
I love that Arrive shows me the route of my packages & provides me up-to-the-minute information about my orders. It‚Äôs far better than relying on UPS, FedEx and/or USPS. So far, it‚Äôs been very accurate. It even shows me delivery exceptions and delays. Highly suggest this app if you do a lot of online shopping/ordering!!!

The only issue I do have with the Arrive App is that I have 2 old orders that the tracking info somehow got duplicated on & I‚Äôm unable to delete the notifications. I also cannot figure out how to archive any of my past deliveries. There‚Äôs no button to press to do so. Other than that, I really like that it pulls the tracking of everything I purchase online associated with my 2 email addresses!

title: Pretty nice but one thing peeves me
text: It‚Äôs really nice to have all your packages tracking simultaneously in one place with maps. The notifications are exciting too when they pop up on my watch. The only thing that really irks me is that sometimes it is behind on the progress of a package. I can click on my tracking number inside the app and the carrier tracking shows three extra cities it‚Äôs been through and when I go back to the app it still hasn‚Äôt caught up. I wish there was a way to force it to check for new progress. Just a button on each package that forces a progress update. If you want to know what‚Äôre all of your packages were a once 12 hours ago, this app is a five star app for you. 4 stars for me though. I want to know where they are now.

title: So Far So Good Except ...
text:
I have an iPad with a keyboard, and this is one of the infuriating apps that does not automatically go to landscape mode, meaning we have to keep turning the hardware physically over onto its side to type then back again to read. It's an easy fix ... if you want to improve things.
Plus sides: it immediately gathered all of the orders I already had in progress and showed me the company I ordered from, the product ordered, where it was currently on a map and the expected delivery date. Pretty good, I think. 
I also really love that they offset the climate effects of delivery if you sign up to pay through them. That is an important gesture and I would like to match the offsets they make for me, if I knew how ...?
:)

title: Latest UI Updates Removed Functionality
text: I‚Äôm not sure why app developers feel the need to change things that are already working completely fine. With the latest update, tracking numbers are automatically removed once an order is marked as delivered. I see no point in this change. All this does is make it harder to find delivered packages. In order to tell if my package was delivered to my doorstep, mail room, or mail box; I now need to try to find the order email, login to my store account and find the order there, or walk to all 3 locations that packages might be delivered to. Before the update, I could just click the order and immediately get to the tracking number.  Bottom line, stop adding worthless updates. Either have a defined purpose for your change, or don‚Äôt make the change.
